0_gem_settings.opt2:
AUTO SAVE BEFORE BATTLE.

[author: igrik] (script79 - wog)

Automatic create save game before the battle.

The save file is called {BattleSave!}

0_gem_settings.line4: Disable the free join of neutrals
0_gem_settings.opt4:
DISABLE THE FREE JOIN OF NEUTRALS

[author: igrik] (script79 - wog)

The script disables the free cost joining of neutral creatures.When the script is enabled, joining is possible only for money.

Attention! This option will not allow you to join your abandoned monsters.
see option 010 Troops left will rejoin their owner
